rule: Each description must not portray the background or outline the setting of the subjects.
input: A group of friends enjoying a picnic in the park.
coverage: A diverse group of friends laughing and sharing a variety of foods on a vibrant picnic blanket in a lush green park during late afternoon, bathed in soft golden sunlight casting gentle shadows. They wear casual summer clothing and engage in lively conversation, surrounded by blooming flowers and tall trees. In the background, a serene lake and rolling hills extend under a clear sky, creating a joyful and relaxed atmosphere that evokes warmth and camaraderie.
validityText:
The input is a clear, concise English sentence within the 80-word limit and is structured as a single paragraph. It serves as a suitable natural language description for creating an AI-generated photo prompt.
